Rainy_Day_0: The sound of rain always makes me feel really cold inside.$3#$b#It is kinda peaceful though...
Rainy_Day_2: Hey, cutie. How are you doing?$1#$b#I hope the rain is what you needed for the farm.
Rainy_Day_3: Hey!Do you want this? I saw it online and it loked good.[848]#$b#It was pretty expensive, I hope you like it.$1
Rainy_Day_4: Make sure you clean up the mud you tracked in.#$b#I'll forget, and then we'll have a muddy floor.$2
Rainy_Night_0: Hey hon. You in for the night?$1#$b#I like having you here.
patio_Emily: You know, every time I think about spending more time outside I do this.#$b#And then remember why I don't stand in the sun all that often...$2#$e#The vitamin D is fresh though.
Rainy_Night_2: We should order in supper.#$b#Trust me. You don't want me to cook.$2#$e#I will mess up on purpose in order to not be asked to cook again.$6
Rainy_Night_3: Hey hon, I microwaved my supper, but I still have leftovers from the cafe in the fridge if you want them.$2
Rainy_Night_4: I'm thinking about starting a sword collection. I accidentally got a double online, want it?[109]
Rainy_Night_5: Hey hon, want to cuddle to shake that rainy chill?$4
Indoor_Day_0: I'm gonna be in here today. I have so much free time now it'd be a shame if I didn't grind out a few levels.$1
Indoor_Day_2: Hon, could you pick up these groceries from the store? I want to follow a couple of cooking tutorials.[172]#$e#I hope its still readable, I dropped it in the sink when I was washing...things...$2
Indoor_Day_3: Hey honey, you're so sweet I um...how does that poem go?$2#$b#Anyway I think you're neat.$1
Indoor_Day_4: Hey hon, I'm exhausted.$2#$e#How'd you sleep?$0
Indoor_Night_0: Hey hon, are you in for the night?$0
Indoor_Night_1: Sometimes I miss the structure that my life had before I got married, but then I finish my second boss in a day and I realise this is waaay cooler.
Indoor_Night_2: Are you going to make dinner? If not I can warm up some leftovers for you.
Indoor_Night_3: Hey hon, how was your day?
Indoor_Night_4: I'm thinking about getting a throw pillow or two... What do you think?
Outdoor_0: Hey hon, I was thinking I could help out outside every once and a while, you know?$1
Outdoor_1: The early morning sun is my favorite kind of sun.$1
Outdoor_2: You're up early!$1#$b#Oh me? I didn't really sleep...$2
Outdoor_3: Hi.#$e#Sorry I'm just super out of it.$2
OneKid_0: Omigosh! %kid1 smiled at me! They are so cute!$1
OneKid_1: I grew up as an only child. I don't want %kid1 to be as lonely as I was...$2#$e#Barring anything else, I'll be there for them, will you?$4
OneKid_3: %kid1 has been quite a handful lately, but I keep thinking of how great family game nights will be when they're older.$1
TwoKids_1: Hon, could you hold %kid2 and watch %kid1 for a moment? I left my computer open and I forgot to save my progress.$3
TwoKids_2: I'm glad we had %kid2. Now to just teach the two of them to get along.$1
TwoKids_3: %kid1 and %kid2 are refusing to eat anything but MarshyCharms Cereal. I need your help with this.$2
Good_1: Hey hon, I just wanted to say that I'm glad you're here.$1
Good_2: Sugar? Sweetie? Honey Pie?#$b#Baby cakes?#$b#No, none of those feel right. But I'll find one!$1
Good_3: Hi honey. You look nice today.$1
Good_4: Love, come here would you? You make me feel so much less alone.$1
Good_5: Hon! Would you like to plan a date night? I could set you up on Actinop...$1
Good_6: Its a beautiful day out there. Make sure to come back safe ok?$1
Bad_1: You ok? I feel like something's wrong.$3
Bad_2: I'm not sure what's wrong, but something definitely is.$3
Bad_3: Who are you? What did you do with the person I loved?$5
Bad_4: Are you feeling ok? You seem... different.$2
Bad_5: Hey, did I do something? Cause honestly something is off.$3
Bad_6: Look. We are not doing super well right now. And if you couldn't tell that, then we've got bigger problems than I thought.$5
funLeave_XenFS: Hey hon, I'm headed out for a bit. Have a good day, yeah?$1
funReturn_XenFS: I'm back! How are you hon?
spring_2: Ah spring.$1#$b#I hope my allergies don't act up too bad.$2#$e#There are many reasons I don't go outside much.
spring_1: What are you gonna do now that spring has sprung?$6
spring_22: Summer is coming, I like the sunshine, but the heat is a little gross.$2
summer_20: Man! It is bright out there!$1
summer_2: I should get a swimsuit. It'd be nice to try the beach every once in a while.$1
fall_25: You should make some pumpkin pie.$1
winter_15: I need some new socks. The holes in mine are getting me a little too well acquainted with winter.$2
spring_XenFS: It's spring! Want to go to the flower dance together?$1
fall_XenFS: Its fall! You should grow some pumpkins.$1
summer_XenFS: Make sure to shake all the sand off. I don't want to sweep up after you.$2
winter_XenFS: Brush the snow off the porch will you hon?
spouseRoom_XenFS: I'm gonna sink into some games today hon.$1
